about_the_game:
Veronica


'Veronica' is a first person psychological horror game based on the events that occur after your movie is interrupted by an amber alert due to sighting reports of a 7 year old girl, Veronica, who went missing 3 years ago. This report catches you by surprise, but not for the reasons you may think.

Why does it seem like you know more about it than you're sharing? The truth shall reveal itself throughout the game.

Gameplay:


‣ Uncover the mystery of Veronica.
‣ Navigate through your apartment & interact with the clues Veronica is leaving.
‣ Jumpscares.
‣ Psychological horror events.
‣ Puzzles.
‣ A story that reveals a dark truth behind the events of the girl who's gone missing.

WARNING: The game contains flashes of light that can cause epileptic seizures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3700X or Intel i3-10100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: May run on systems with lower specs, but with low framerate.
